Package com.intellij.openapi.ui.popup

Interface ListPopupStep<T>

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    ListPopupStepEx<T>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    ActionPopupStep, AttachToProcessActionBase.AttachListStep, BaseListPopupStep, IntentionListStep, JsonSchemaInfoPopupStep, LookupActionsStep, MultiSelectionListPopupStep, PythonSdkDetailsStep

    public interface ListPopupStep<T>
    Interface for a custom step in a list popup.
    See Also:
    ListPopup, JBPopupFactory.createListPopup(ListPopupStep)

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Default Methods

      int getDefaultOptionIndex()
      Returns the index of the item to be initially selected in the list.
